title: Quantum-Adversary-Resilient Evidence Structures and Migration Strategies for Regulated AI Audit Trails
summary: Constant-size cryptographic evidence records are increasingly used to build audit trails for regulated AI workloads in clinical, pharmaceutical, and financial settings, where each execution is summarized by a compact, verifiable record of code identity, model version, data digests, and platform measurements.
